Rule: Visa-free and ID-only travel within member countries

Rule: Visa-free and often ID-only travel among member states

Rule: Visa-free travel for CARICOM passport holders

Rule: Short-term visa-free travel among member states

Rule: Bilateral visa-free or simplified visa arrangements

Rule: No visa required for travel or residence
Visa-free travel to the USA for up to 90 days with mandatory ESTA approval
